comment.body: would it be possible to integrate SafePress code into ZeroNet and help make ZeroNet sites easier to make using a Wordpress-like admin panel and CMS? http://safepress.io/

When you say "Live source code reloading: Faster core development by allowing me to make changes in ZeroNet source code without restarting it.", do you mean you can force everyone's copy of ZeroNet to auto-update to a new version without them giving permission?
